alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 4:29AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF FAYETTE, SOUTHWESTERN PICKAWAY AND NORTHWESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 500 AM EDT... At 429 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over New Holland, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, New Holland, Staunton, Good Hope, Frankfort, Clarksburg, Deer Creek Lake, Andersonville, Austin, Jasper Mills, Madison Mills, Rock Mills, New Martinsburg, Pancoastburg, and Plano. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
